channel.title: My new 317 Server is having bug problems!
channel.description:
Can someone please Help me, on my new 317 server, there are many bugs, some of the NPCS When attempting to trade will automaticly make you DC. Also, when trying to PK there is a very good pk set up, but yet whenever you just click attack whoever, it also DC's you! Someone please!, help me.. reply here and if you're a good coder add me on MSN
Killacam31600@yahoo.com

item.title: My new 317 Server is having bug problems!
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

That’s odd? Where are you downloading them from? Are they Blank Sources? You can download your share of Sources and Clients from here:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

If you are wanting blank sources, those are kind of hard to find, but there might be some in there.

Read full topic
item.source: My new 317 Server is having bug problems!

item.title: My new 317 Server is having bug problems!
item.dc:creator: @jagex4lmo jagex4lmo
item.description:
@jagex4lmo wrote:

Well, i’ve already tried it… ive done almost like 5 different sourced, and they all fail at pking and npcs… do you have any kind of good pking sources you know about that you can let me know about.

Read full topic
item.source: My new 317 Server is having bug problems!

item.title: My new 317 Server is having bug problems!
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

I suggest with those kind of problems you re-download where you got our source and client from. If that doesn’t work, well maybe you should try getting another source.

Read full topic
